data.lyric:
[ti:She's With Me]
[ar:High Valley]
[al:Dear Life]

[00:00.00]She's With Me - High Valley
[00:04.22]Written by：Brad Rempel/Seth Mosley/Ben Stennis
[00:08.44]When the devil's knocking at my door
[00:11.23]
[00:12.65]When I'm broken and I'm battle worn
[00:15.68]
[00:17.44]Down in the valley on my knees
[00:19.96]
[00:21.24]Yea she's yea she's with me
[00:24.62]
[00:25.66]Ain't she amazing amazing out of my league
[00:29.90]And ain't it crazy crazy she happened to me
[00:34.06]She calls me baby baby hard to believe
[00:38.75]That she's yea she's with me
[00:43.76]
[00:47.34]When my dreams are running out of road
[00:50.25]
[00:51.74]And the world around me's turning cold
[00:54.74]
[00:56.32]Anyone else would up and leave
[00:58.94]
[01:00.35]But she's yea she's with me
[01:03.61]
[01:04.59]Ain't she amazing amazing out of my league
[01:08.80]And ain't it crazy crazy she happened to me
[01:13.00]She calls me baby baby hard to believe
[01:17.70]That she's yea she's with me
[01:21.98]
[01:22.53]Top of the mountain and all the way down
[01:24.64]When I'm lost and when I'm found
[01:26.75]In the day in the light in the dark of the night
[01:28.74]When it all goes wrong when it all goes right
[01:31.06]
[01:31.74]Whoa oh I don't know what I'd do without her
[01:35.26]
[01:36.10]Whoa oh she's gotta know I'm all about her
[01:38.98]She's amazing amazing
[01:41.44]
[01:43.33]Ain't she amazing amazing
[01:48.08]Ain't she amazing amazing out of my league
[01:52.03]And ain't it crazy crazy she happened to me
[01:56.27]She calls me baby baby hard to believe
[02:00.89]That she's yea she's with me
[02:05.16]Ain't she amazing amazing that girl she's out of my league
[02:09.71]And ain't it crazy crazy she happened to me
[02:13.51]She calls me baby baby hard to believe
[02:18.23]That she's yea she's with me
[02:22.69]That she's yea she's with me
[02:26.79]

[02:29.46]When I'm lost and when I'm found
[02:32.06]
[02:35.86]In the day in the light in the dark of the night
[02:37.95]When it all goes wrong when it all goes right
[02:40.32]
[02:44.77]Top of the mountain and all the way down
[02:46.62]When I'm lost and when I'm found

data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:High Valley]
[al:Dear Life]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.22]//
[00:08.44]当恶魔试图敲开我的心门
[00:11.23]
[00:12.65]当我支离破碎 一败涂地
[00:15.68]
[00:17.44]陷入绝望的深渊
[00:19.96]
[00:21.24]有她 有她陪着我
[00:24.62]
[00:25.65]她难道不迷人吗 迷人得超乎我的想象
[00:29.90]她就这样闯入我的生命 这难道不疯狂吗
[00:34.06]她叫我宝贝 这令人难以置信
[00:38.75]有她 有她陪着我
[00:43.76]
[00:47.34]当我丧失追逐梦想的勇气
[00:50.25]
[00:51.74]我的世界变得异常冰冷
[00:54.74]
[00:56.32]别人都是来去匆匆
[00:58.94]
[01:00.35]但是 只有她 一直陪着我
[01:03.61]
[01:04.59]她难道不迷人吗 迷人得超乎我的想象
[01:08.80]她就这样闯入我的生命 这难道不疯狂吗
[01:13.00]她叫我宝贝 这令人难以置信
[01:17.70]有她 有她陪着我
[01:21.98]
[01:22.53]不管傲视群雄还是仕途失意
[01:24.64]不管得失与否
[01:26.75]不管在明媚的白昼 还是漆黑的夜晚
[01:28.74]不论我成败与否
[01:31.05]
[01:31.74]我无法想象 没有她我该怎么办
[01:35.26]
[01:36.10]她会明白 她就是我的全世界
[01:38.98]她如此迷人
[01:41.44]
[01:43.33]她难道不迷人吗
[01:48.08]迷人得超乎我的想象
[01:52.03]她就这样闯入我的生命 这难道不疯狂吗
[01:56.27]她叫我宝贝 这令人难以置信
[02:00.89]有她 有她陪着我
[02:05.16]她难道不迷人吗 迷人得超乎我的想象
[02:09.71]她就这样闯入我的生命 这难道不疯狂吗
[02:13.51]她叫我宝贝 这令人难以置信
[02:18.23]有她 有她陪着我
[02:22.69]有她 有她陪着我
[02:26.79]
[02:27.49]不管傲视群雄还是仕途失意
[02:29.46]不管得失与否
[02:32.06]
[02:35.86]不管在明媚的白昼 还是漆黑的夜晚
[02:37.95]不论我成败与否
[02:40.32]
[02:44.77]不管傲视群雄还是仕途失意
